description: This file contains styles for the editor component of a text formatting application, defining the appearance and responsive behavior of the editor container and textarea.

classes.name: editor-container
classes.description: Styles for the main container of the editor, including padding, background color, border radius, and shadow effects.

classes.name: editor-textarea
classes.description: Styles for the textarea within the editor, detailing width, height, font properties, and various responsive adjustments.
